languages.text: Представители Экклезиархии публично подтвердили чистоту Вольного Торговца перед Императором, и слухи сошли на нет.
Indulging in the vice of rest, the subjects forget the rumours as easily as they forget their debt to the God-Emperor.
languages.original_text: Предавшись пороку отдыха, подданные забыли не только слухах, но и своем долге перед Богом-Императором.

traits.locale_text: Indulging in the vice of rest, the subjects forget the rumours as easily as they forget their debt to the God-Emperor.
Indulging in the vice of rest, the subjects forget the rumours as easily as they forget their debt to the God-Emperor.
Indulging in the vice of rest, the subjects forget the rumours as easily as they forget their debt to the God-Emperor.
Indulging in the vice of rest, the subjects forget the rumours as easily as they forget their debt to the God-Emperor.

languages.text: En se livrant au vice du repos, les sujets oublient les rumeurs aussi facilement que leur dette envers l'Empereur-Dieu.
languages.original_text: Indulging in the vice of rest, the subjects forget the rumours as easily as they forget their debt to the God-Emperor.

traits.locale_text: En se livrant au vice du repos, les sujets oublient les rumeurs aussi facilement que leur dette envers l'Empereur-Dieu.

languages.text: 休息という悪徳にふけると、臣民は神帝陛下への恩義を忘れるのと同じくらい簡単に噂を忘れてしまう。
languages.original_text: Indulging in the vice of rest, the subjects forget the rumours as easily as they forget their debt to the God-Emperor.

traits.locale_text: 休息という悪徳にふけると、臣民は神帝陛下への恩義を忘れるのと同じくらい簡単に噂を忘れてしまう。

languages.text: 在好逸恶劳的堕落中，民众很快忘记了恶毒的流言，但同样忘记了他们应当对神皇履行的职责。
languages.original_text: Indulging in the vice of rest, the subjects forget the rumours as easily as they forget their debt to the God-Emperor.

traits.locale_text: 在好逸恶劳的堕落中，民众很快忘记了恶毒的流言，但同样忘记了他们应当对神皇履行的职责。

languages.text: Al ceder al vicio del ocio, la población olvida los rumores con la misma facilidad con que olvida su deuda con el Dios Emperador.
languages.original_text: Indulging in the vice of rest, the subjects forget the rumours as easily as they forget their debt to the God-Emperor.

traits.locale_text: Al ceder al vicio del ocio, la población olvida los rumores con la misma facilidad con que olvida su deuda con el Dios Emperador.

languages.text: Die Untertanen frönen dem Laster des Faulenzens und vergessen die Gerüchte ebenso schnell wie ihre Schuld gegenüber dem Gottimperator.
languages.original_text: Indulging in the vice of rest, the subjects forget the rumours as easily as they forget their debt to the God-Emperor.

traits.locale_text: Die Untertanen frönen dem Laster des Faulenzens und vergessen die Gerüchte ebenso schnell wie ihre Schuld gegenüber dem Gottimperator.
